scenes.background: Bob sighs and leans back in his chair.
scenes.description: Sticking to one plan might be boring for some of us.

options.text: We can always add a fun twist to the plan to keep it interesting.
options.analysis: You suggested an innovative solution, showing good perception and social skills, though empathy and self-regulation were moderate.

options.text: It's true, but having a clear plan can help us avoid confusion.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the concern but emphasized the benefits of having a clear plan, showing good empathy and self-regulation, though social skill and perception were moderate.

options.text: If we try to please everyone, we might end up not pleasing anyone.
options.analysis: You pointed out the potential downside of trying to please everyone, showing good empathy and motivation, but social skill and perception were lower.
